question: The World's only commercially operating fast breeder reactor is situated in which country?
explanation: Indian nuclear scientists are in the final stages of starting a high-tech “Fast-Breeder Reactor” (FBR) in Kalpakkam in Chennai. This FBR will generate more atomic fuel than they consume as they work. Currently, there is only one commercially operating fast breeder reactor in the world. It is situated in the Ural Mountains of Russia at the Beloyarsk Nuclear Power Plant, near Russia's fourth largest city Yekaterinburg.
